description: List details about a specific contact channel.

parameters.name: ContactChannelId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel you want information about.

nested_items.name: ContactArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the contact that the channel belongs to.

nested_items.name: ContactChannelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the contact channel.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the contact channel.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of contact channel. The type is SMS, VOICE, or EMAIL.

nested_items.name: DeliveryAddress
nested_items.description: The details that Incident Manager uses when trying to engage the contact channel.

nested_items.name: SimpleAddress
nested_items.description: The format is dependent on the type of the contact channel. The following are the expected formats:
SMS - --+' followed by the country code and phone number.
VOICE - --+' followed by the country code and phone number.

nested_items.name: ActivationStatus
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating if the contact channel has been activated or not.
